alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 18 at 3:56PM PDT until August 18 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Eastern Lincoln County in south central Nevada... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 356 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain west of Beaver Dam. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. This flooding may impact Beaver Dam Road. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Beaver Dam State Park. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
